data: RESP AMB Adult Cystic Fibrosis Pseudomonas Eradication Protocol (Module)
Medications
tobramycin and aztreonam require Special Authority
Please confirm patient passed Tobi Podhaler challenge
tobramycin 300 mg/5 mL nebule
300 mg/ 5mL, nebulized, BID, order duration: 28 day, dispense qty: 56 nebule, refill(s): 0
tobramycin 28 mg inhalation capsule
112 mg, inhalation, BID, order duration: 28 day, dispense qty: 224 cap, refill(s): 0
colistimethate 150 mg (colistin base) injection
150 mg, inhalation, BID, order duration: 28 day, drug form: inj, dispense qty: 56 vial, refill(s): 0
If patient is pregnant or breastfeeding, or if tobramycin formulations are not tolerated
aztreonam 75 mg inhalation
75 mg, nebulized, TID, order duration: 28 day, dispense qty: 84 vial, refill(s): 0
ciprofloxacin 750 mg oral tablet
750 mg, PO, BID, order duration: 14 day, dispense qty: 28 cap, refill(s): 0
750 mg, PO, TID, order duration: 14 day, dispense qty: 42 cap, refill(s): 0
Laboratory
To be done on day 21 after treatment initiation
Sputum C&S
Please send sample to St. Paul's Hospital Microbiology Lab (Cystic Fibrosis Bench), Routine, Collection: T;N, once, Order for future visit
Sputum C&S
Please send sample to St. Paul's Hospital Microbiology Lab (Cystic Fibrosis Bench), Routine, Collection: T;N, once, Order for future visit
Sputum C&S
Please send sample to St. Paul's Hospital Microbiology Lab (Cystic Fibrosis Bench), Routine, Collection: T;N, once, Order for future visit
Diagnostic Tests
Consider ECG if cpirofloxacin is prescribed
ECG 12 Lead
Routine, Order for future visit, SPH Cystic Fibrosis Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St
